name: Dinari RKLB
description: The Dinari RKLB dShares token (RKLB.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in Rocket Lab USA, Inc. (NASDAQ: RKLB), a prominent aerospace manufacturer and launch service provider specializing in small satellite launches and space systems solutions. Each RKLB.d token is fully backed by a corresponding Rocket Lab stock share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, RKLB.d offers investors exposure to Rocket Lab's equity through a regulated financial product, providing benefits such as 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
